discordApp.descServInfo: Your server is where you meet your friends. Create yours and start talking
discordApp.infoServer: Tell us a little about your server
discordApp.descModal2: In order to help you with the configuration, we would like to know if your server is only for a few friends or for a larger community.
discordApp.descModal3: Give your new server a personality of its own with a name and an icon. You can always change it later
discordApp.pol: By creating a server, you agree to the ZoomCord Community Guidelines.
discordApp.inviteServ: Send this link to your friend!!
discordApp.modalDelServQuestion: Are you sure you want to eliminate
discordApp.questionNameModal: Do you want to change the server name
